com.mopub.common

Class ClientMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopub.common.ClientMetadata

  • public class ClientMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton that caches Client objects so they will be available to background threads.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ClientMetadata getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the singleton ClientMetadata object, using the context to obtain data if necessary.

      • getInstance

        public static ClientMetadata getInstance()
        Can be used by background threads and other objects without a context to attempt to get ClientMetadata. If the object has never been referenced from a thread with a context, this will return null.
